Futility UI

The Simple Web Framework

Futility UI is a lightweight toolkit for practical web development, usable as a website boilerplate, design styleguide, drop-in utility package - or more.

The Futility system consists of these main parts:

  • CSS Framework — A minimalist, utility-based CSS schema, inspired by Bootstrap 4 and Tailwind.
  • Template Collection — Helpful starter pages showcasing typical web layouts, in HTML and EJS.
  • Dev Server — Live reloading Express.js server for previewing your custom Futility site.
  • Build Script — Bash-based static site generator for rendering your custom Futility site.

Putting this all together, #FUI is intended for any project seeking to craft robust, bespoke design system. In fact, this page itself is built with Futility!
